domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

text:
@GOVUK Set up a simple COVID-19 specific phone line such as 333 or similar. There was one for traffic cones many moons back FFS. 

Reckon you can manage that or are you just going to continue being one of the most incompetent governments this world has ever seen?
